reviews.text: Bring Back Angry Birds: Star Wars 1 & 2!!! Those 2 games were very influential on the lives of me and others from my generation!!! Those games deserve to be brought back!!! #bringbackangrybirdsstarwars

reviews.name: Good game, has its momentsâ€¦
reviews.title: Good game, has its momentsâ€¦
reviews.text: This is a good game, donâ€™t get me wrong, but it has more bad things than good. Iâ€™ve loved angry birds since I was a baby, but this one just isnâ€™t my favorite. First of all, and this might be a common opinion, but there are SO many ads. Occasionally, theyâ€™ll take you straight to the App Store even if you donâ€™t tap it, and that is so agitating. Another thing is randomizing the bird cards at the beginning of each level, and in some cases, the layout for each level changes too. Later on in the game the levels get harder and harder and it would be nice to have a set-in-stone way to beat each level rather than getting lucky some day. Rovio has made a shuffle deck feature to change this problem but even then you have to rely on luck. (This next one is gonna trigger me the most) Remember in angry birds 1 when you got to retry a level as many times as you needed? Well now you only get five tries and when you run out, you have to wait about 25 minutes to get one try and for all the retries, you have to wait an hour or 2. overall, angry birds 2 has more bad thing than good, but there are small good things that are just outweighed by the bad things. Iâ€™m not gonna discourage you from getting this game, you just might want to take this review as a warning. And Rovio, if youâ€™re listening to this, please fix the retry system.

reviews.name: Ripped off
reviews.title: Ripped off
reviews.text: Iâ€™ve been playing Angry Birds for a pretty long time, getting steadily more bored with it, but lured onwards by increasing my bird and slingshot status.  I reached diamond slingshot in the arena, and the very next day, 90 points disappeared, leaving my status back at the previous level.  Three help tickets later, no response and no return to diamond. Almost ready to let my poor disappointed bird die and quit the game for good.

reviews.title: There is a bug in the clan system
reviews.text: There are no new players added to my clan. I have been stuck on 10 players for months. I removed individuals for not participating and it use to add new players. Now it doesnâ€™t do that.
